trans-unit.target: Titel da la pagina d'internet

trans-unit.source: Please enter the title of the website.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha il titel da la pagina d'internet

trans-unit.source: E-mail address of the system administrator
trans-unit.target: Adressa dad e-mail da l'administratur dal sistem

trans-unit.source: Auto-generated messages like subscription confirmation e-mails will be sent to this address.
trans-unit.target: Messadis generads automaticamain sco confermaziuns dad abunaments vegnan tramess a questa adressa.
Format da data

trans-unit.source: The date format string will be parsed with the PHP date() function.
trans-unit.target: Il string da format da data endatà vegn elavura da la funcziun date() da PHP.
Format da temp

trans-unit.source: The time format string will be parsed with the PHP date() function.
trans-unit.target: Il string da format da temp endatà vegn elavura da la funcziun date() da PHP.
Format da data e temp

trans-unit.source: The date and time format string will be parsed with the PHP date() function.
trans-unit.target: Il string da format da data e temp endatà vegn elavura da la funcziun date() da PHP.
Zona d'urari

trans-unit.source: Please select the server time zone.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna la zona d'urari dal server.

trans-unit.source: Relative path to the Contao directory
trans-unit.target: Decurs relativ a l'ordinatur da Contao

trans-unit.source: The relative path to the Contao directory is usually set automatically by the install tool.
trans-unit.target: Il decurs relativ a l'ordinatur da Contao vegn per ordinari emplenì automaticamain da l'utensil d'installaziun da Contao.
Set da caracters

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to use UTF-8, so special characters are displayed correctly.
trans-unit.target: I è recumandà dad utilisar UTF-8 per che caracters spezials vegnan mussads correctamain.
Secziuns da layout persunalisadas.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of custom layout sections.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista separada entras commas cun secziun persunalisadas dal layout.
Deactivar il planisader da cumonds

trans-unit.source: Disable the periodic command scheduler and execute the cron.php script by a real cron job (which you have to set up manually).
trans-unit.target: Deactivar il planisader da cumonds ed exequir la datoteca cron.php entras in endretg cron job (che ti stos installar manualmain).
Cumprimer il code HMTL

trans-unit.source: Minify the HTML markup before it is sent to the browser (requires the PHP tidy extension).
trans-unit.target: Cumprimer il code HTML avant che trametter el al navigatur (basegna l'extensiun da PHP tidy).
Cumprimer ils scripts

trans-unit.source: Create a compressed version of the combined CSS and JavaScript files. Requires adjustments of the .htaccess file.
trans-unit.target: Crear versiuns cumprimidas da datotecas da CSS e JavaScript cumbinadas. Basegna in'adattaziun da la datoteca .htaccess.
Elements per pagina

trans-unit.source: Here you can define the number of items per page in the back end.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir il dumber d'elements per pagina en il back-end.
Dumber maximal dad elements per pagina

trans-unit.source: This overall limit takes effect if a user chooses the "show all records" option.
trans-unit.target: Questa limita globala vegn activa, sche l'utilisader tscherna l'opziun "mussar tut ils elements".
Excluder ordinaturs da la sincronisaziun

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of folders which will be exempt from the files synchronization (e.g. attachments,music_academy). Note that excluded resources cannot be used in e.g. image or download elements!
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista separada entras commas dad orinaturs che na vegnan betg resguardads tar la sincronisaziun da datotecas (p.ex. attachments,music_academy). Fa stim che resursas exclusas na pon betg vegnir utilisadas en elements da maletgs u telechargiar.
Na betg reducir ils elements

trans-unit.source: Do not collapse elements in the back end preview.
trans-unit.target: Na betg reducir ils elements en la prevista dal back-end.
Suffix da l'URL

trans-unit.source: The URL suffix will be added to the URI string to simulate static documents.
trans-unit.target: Quest suffix da l'URL vegn agiuntà al string dad URI per simular documents statics.
Modus da cache.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the cache mode.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il modus da cache.
Anonimisar adressas dad IP

trans-unit.source: Anonymize any IP address that is stored in the database, except in the tl_session table (the IP address is bound to the session for security reasons).
trans-unit.target: Anonimisar mintga adressa dad IP ch'è memorisada en la banca da datas, exclus en la tabella tl_session (per motivs da segirezza è l'adressa dad IP liada a la sessiun).
Anonimisar Google Analytics

trans-unit.source: Anonymize the IP addresses that are sent to Google Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Anonimisar las adressas dad IP che vegnan tramessas a Google Analytics.
Scriver enturn ils URLs

trans-unit.source: Make Contao generate static URLs without the index.php fragment. This feature requires "mod_rewrite", renaming the ".htaccess.default" file to ".htaccess" and adjusting the RewriteBase as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Per crear URLs senza il fragment index.php. Per questa funcziun sto "mod_rewrite" esser disponibel, la datoteca ".htaccess.default" sto vegnir renumnada en ".htaccess" ed eventualmain stos ti adattar la RewriteBase.

trans-unit.source: Add the language to the URL
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar la lingua a l'URL

trans-unit.source: Add the language string as first URL parameter (e.g. http://domain.tld/en/).
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar la lingua sco emprim parameter da l'URL (p. ex. http://domain.tld/en/).
Na betg renviar URLs vidas

trans-unit.source: For an empty URL display the website instead of redirecting to the language root page (not recommended).
trans-unit.target: Mussar en cas d'ina URL vida la pagina d'internet empè da renviar a la pagina da ragisch da la lingua (betg recumandà).
Activar auto_item

trans-unit.source: Skip the items/ or events/ fragment in the URL and automatically discover the item based on the auto_item parameter.
trans-unit.target: Laschar davent ils fragments items/ ed events/ en l'URL ed identifitgar automaticamain l'element a basa dal parameter auto_item.
Deactivar l'utilisaziun dad alias da paginas.

trans-unit.source: Use the numeric ID of a page or article instead of its alias.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar empè la ID numerica d'ina pagina u d'in artitgel.
Activar la structura d'ordinaturs en URLs

trans-unit.source: Here you can enable folder-style page aliases like docs/install/download.html instead of docs-install-download.html.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti activar alias en furma dad ordinaturs sco docs/install/download.html empè da docs-install-download.html.
Tags da HTML lubids

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a list of allowed HTML tags that will not be stripped.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista dals tags da HTML che na duain betg vegnir eliminads.
Activar il modus da chattar sbagls

trans-unit.source: Print certain runtime information like database queries to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Mussar sin il visur tschertas infurmaziuns davart l'execuziun sco p. ex. dumondas a las bancas da datas.
Guntgir il cache intern

trans-unit.source: Do not use the internal cache files (e.g. useful when developing extensions).
trans-unit.target: Na betg utilisar las datotecas da cache internas (p. ex. util sche ti sviluppeschas extensiuns).
Deactivar tokens da dumondas

trans-unit.source: Do not check the request token when a form is submitted. Attention: potential security risk!
trans-unit.target: Na betg controllar ils tokens da dumondas sch'in formular vegn tramess. Attenziun: Ristg da segirezza potenzial.
Temp da bloccar il conto.

trans-unit.source: An account will be locked if a wrong password is entered three times in a row.
trans-unit.target: In conto vegn bloccà sch'in pled-clav fauss vegn endatà trais giadas ina suenter l'autra.
Mussar messadis d'errur

trans-unit.source: Print error messages to the screen (not recommended for productional sites).
trans-unit.target: Mussar messadis d'errur sin il visur (betg recumandà per paginas productivas).
Protocollar messadis d'errur

trans-unit.source: Write error messages to the error log file (system/logs/error.log).
trans-unit.target: Scriver errurs en la datoteca da protocol dad errurs (system/logs/error.log) .
Exequir en il modus segirà

trans-unit.source: Run Contao in safe mode and load only core modules.
trans-unit.target: Exequir Contao en il modus segirà e be chargiar ils moduls dal core.
Deactivar la controlla dad adressas dad IP

trans-unit.source: Do not bind sessions to IP addresses. Choosing this option is a potential security risk!
trans-unit.target: Na betg colliar adressas dad IP cun las sessiuns. Tscherner questa opziun è ina ristga da segirezza potenziala.
Tips da datotecas per telechargiar

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of downloadable file types.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista separada entras commas da tips da datotecas che pon vegnir telechargiadas.
Tips da datotecas da maletgs

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of file types that can be handled by the image class.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista separada entras commas da tips da datotecas da maletgs che pon vegnir elavurads da la classa da maletgs.
Tips da datoteca modifitgabels

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of file types that can be edited in the source editor.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista sepaprada entras commas da tips da datotecas che san vegnir modifitgadas en l'editur da code.
Tips da datotecas per templates

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of supported template file types.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista separada entras commas da tips da datotecas che pon vegnir utilisads per templates.
Largezza maximala per il front-end

trans-unit.source: If the width of an image or movie exceeds this value, it will be adjusted automatically.
trans-unit.target: Sche la largezza d'in maletg u video surpassa questa valur, vegn ella adattada automaticamain.
Qualitad da miniaturas da JPG

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the JPG thumbnail quality in percent.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la qualitad da miniaturas da JPG en pertschient.
Largezza maximala da maletgs per GD

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum image width that the GD library shall try to handle.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la largezza maximala da maletgs che la biblioteca da GD duai empruvar dad elavurar.
Autezza maximala da maletgs per GD

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum image height that the GD library shall try to handle.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la autezza maximala da maletgs che la biblioteca da GD duai empruvar dad elavurar.
Ordinatur da datoteca

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the relative path to the Contao files directory.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir il decurs relativ a l'ordinatur da datotecas da Contao.
Tips da datotecas per transferir

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of uploadable file types.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina glista separada entras commas da tips da datotecas che pon vegnir transferids sin il server.
Transfers simultans

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum number of simultaneous file uploads.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il dumber maximal da transfers da datotecas che pon capitar simultan.
Grondezza da transferir maximala

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum upload file size in bytes (1 MB = 1000 kB = 1000000 byte).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la grondezza maximala per che datotecas pon anc vegnir transferidas sin il server en bytes (1 MB = 1000 kB = 1000000 byte).
Largezza maximala da maletgs

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum width for image uploads in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la largezza maximala en pixels per transferir maletgs sin il server.
Autezza maximala da maletgs

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum height for image uploads in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la autezza maximala en pixels per transferir maletgs sin il server.
Activar il tschertgar

trans-unit.source: Index pages so they can be searched.
trans-unit.target: Indexar las paginas per ch'ellas pon vegnir tschertgadas
Indexar era paginas protegidas

trans-unit.source: Use this option carefully and always exclude personalized pages from being indexed!
trans-unit.target: Fa attenziun sche ti utiliseschas questa funcziun ed excluda adina paginas persunalisadas da l'index!
Trametter e-mails via SMTP

trans-unit.source: Use an SMTP server instead of the PHP mail() function to send e-mails.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar in server da SMTP empè da la funcziun mail() da PHP per trametter e-mails.
Host da SMTP

trans-unit.source: Please enter the host name of the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha il num dal host dal server SMTP.
Num d'utilisader SMTP

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the SMTP username.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il num d'utilisader per il server da SMTP.
Pled-clav SMTP

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the SMTP password.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il pled-clav per il server da SMTP.
Criptadi per SMTP

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose an encryption method (SSL or TLS).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner ina metoda da criptadi (SSL u TLS).
Numer da port da SMTP

trans-unit.source: Please enter the port number of the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha il numer da port dal server SMTP.
Extensiuns inactivas

trans-unit.source: Here you can deactivate unneeded extensions.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti deactivar extensiuns che na vegnan betg utilisadas.
Temp da memorisar per pass da revocar

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the storage time for undo steps in seconds (24 hours = 86400 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il temp da memorisar per pass da revocar en secundas (24 uras = 86400 secundas).
Temp da memorisar per versiuns

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the storage time for different versions of a record in seconds (90 days = 7776000 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il temp da memorisar per differentas versiuns d'in element en secundas (90 dis = 7776000 secundas).
Temp da memorisar per endataziuns dal protocol

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the storage time for log entries in seconds (14 days = 1209600 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il temp da memorisar per endataziuns en il protocol en secundas (14 dis = 1209600 secundas).
Temp da la sessiun

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum lifetime of a session in seconds (60 minutes = 3600 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar il temp maximal dad ina sessiun en secundas (60 minutas = 3600 secundas).
Temp per s'annunziar automaticamain

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the front end auto login period (90 days = 7776000 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir il temp per s'annunziar automaticamain (90 dis = 7776000 secundas).
Possessur da standard da la pagina

trans-unit.source: Here you can select a user as the default owner of a page.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner in utilisader sco possessur da standard da la pagina.
Gruppa da standard

trans-unit.source: Here you can select a group as the default owner of a page.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner ina gruppa da standard sco possessur da la pagina.
Dretgs d'access da standard

trans-unit.source: Please assign the default access rights for pages and articles.
trans-unit.target: Definescha ils dretgs d'access da standard per paginas ed artitgels.
URL per l'actualisaziun directa

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the Live Update URL.

trans-unit.target: Titel da la pagina d'internet
Data e temp
Configuraziun globala
Configuraziun dal back-end
Configuraziun dal front-end
Secziuns dal layout
Opziuns per la sfera privata
Opziuns per la segirezza
Datotecas e maletgs
Opziuns per transferir datotecas
Opziuns da la maschina da tschertgar
Configuraziun da SMTP
Safe Mode Hack
Extensiuns inactivas
Valurs da temp
Dretgs d'access da standard
Actualisaziun directa (Live Update)
Resursas staticas
Modifitgar la configuraziun locala

trans-unit.source: Use the server and the browser cache
trans-unit.target: Utilisar il cache dal server e dal navigatur
Be utilisar il cache dal server
Be utilisar il cache dal navigatur
Deactivar il cache
